page.title: 07"MAY'S SHOP".
page.content: {May's}is a{general store}selling {vegetables,fruit,groceries,bread, {household goods}, and other {miscellaneous}items.The owners ,{Mr & {Mrs May}are allowed to sell anything except some{pharmaceutical}items eg. Farex baby food. The shop has been operating as a general store since the present owners took over{26 }years ago. Formally it was an old{bakery}which had been in operation for{100}years. The old bakery is now used as an antique shop,although the original ovens still exist. The shop is open for 5 days during the week, being closed all day on{ {Tuesday,}and for one hour on{Sunday, from{12pm}until{1pm.
